name: Robotics;Notes
description:
Robotics;Notes is an adventure game developed by 5pb. It was originally released in 2012. 5pb published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Robotics;Notes is available on Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PS Vita.
It was produced by Tatsuya Matsubara. Toshihiko Kajioka directed the game. It was scored by Takeshi Abo.
